extDescription.message: Block distracting websites during work hours to help you stay focused

alertSelectDay.message: Please select at least one day

alertDeleteError.message: Error deleting site, please try again

alertAddError.message: Error adding site, please try again

confirmDelete.message: Staying focused has many benefits, but persistence is key. Are you sure you want to unblock $DOMAIN$?

blockedMsg1.message: This site is blocked during the current time period

blockedMsg2.message: This is to help you stay focused and work efficiently

tip1.message: Take three deep breaths to refocus your mind

tip2.message: Drink a glass of water to stay energized

footer.message: Focus Lock helps you build better browsing habits

quote1.message: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

quote2.message: Do not dwell on the past, do not worry about the future, focus on the present.

quote3.message: The more one thinks of good, the better the world becomes.

quote4.message: You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

quote5.message: Sitting quietly, doing nothing, spring comes, and the grass grows by itself.

quote6.message: Demand not that events happen as you wish, but wish them to happen as they do, and you will go on well.

quote7.message: When the mind is still, all things return to one.

quote8.message: Meditation is the inner awareness of the mind's nature remaining unmoved.

quote9.message: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.

quote10.message: The first and best victory is to conquer self.

quote11.message: The truly free person is the one who masters oneself.

quote12.message: A mind like still water can reflect the entire universe.

quote13.message: In good and evil, let no thought arise — this is called sitting. Seeing the self-nature unmoved — this is called meditation.
